meanings.definition: A person who is enjoying themselves in a lively and noisy way at a party or celebration.
meanings.sent1: The reveler danced joyfully at the birthday party.
meanings.sent2: The reveler sang along with the music at the concert.
meanings.sent3: The reveler's laughter filled the room with happiness.
meanings.sent4: Like a colorful butterfly, the reveler flitted from group to group.
meanings.sent5: The reveler's energy was contagious, lighting up the gathering.

meanings.definition: To take great pleasure or delight in something.
meanings.sent1: She would revel in the beauty of the sunset every evening.
meanings.sent2: The children reveled in the snowfall, building snowmen and having snowball fights.
meanings.sent3: He would revel in the taste of his favorite ice cream on a hot day.
meanings.sent4: The artist reveled in the freedom of expression on the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The gardener reveled in the vibrant colors of the blooming flowers.
